thread.title: Overwatch patch notes reveal who is getting a MAJOR PTR nerf next.. and it isn’t Bastion
thread.title_full: Overwatch patch notes reveal who is getting a MAJOR PTR nerf next.. and it isn’t Bastion

title: Overwatch patch notes reveal who is getting a MAJOR PTR nerf next.. and it isn’t Bastion
text:
Overwatch patch notes reveal who is getting a MAJOR PTR nerf next.. and it isn’t Bastion Overwatch patch notes reveal who is getting a MAJOR PTR nerf next.. and it isn’t Bastion OVERWATCH PATCH notes revealed by Blizzard look to have revealed which characters could be next for the major nerfing treatment... and it isn’t Bastion. PUBLISHED: 07:54, Tue, Mar 7, 2017 | UPDATED: 08:02, Tue, Mar 7, 2017 BLIZZARD The new Overwatch patch notes reveal that Blizzard have some serious nerfing plans 
New Overwatch patch notes from the PTR servers show that Blizzard are working on some pretty significant character changes. 
And while Bastion may have come in for the biggest overhaul of late, it appears that it will be be the sneaky healing sniper that is going to see the biggest nerf. 
Ana sees her Biotic Rifle damage drop from 80 to 60, while her Biotic grande is also being hit pretty hard, going from 60 to 30 damage. 
The biggest change could be for healing though, with her healthy bullet dropping 100 to 50 healing factor. 
“As we iterate on the PTR patch, we are going to be trying out the following hero changes,” a message from Blizzard explains. 
“These should be up on the PTR very soon, hopefully tomorrow morning. As always these updates are subject to change.” 
There have been a flurry of changes and tweaks made via the PTR servers over the past week, with an earlier change being made to the newly revamped Bastion. New Overwatch Hero: Orisa screenshots Sun, February 26, 2017
